subject: Study: Benefits of Unit Testing
msgSnippet: Hi, I am an MBA student at the University of Liverpool and am conducting a study into the benefits that software organizations gain by actively practicing unit
messageBody:
Hi, I am an MBA student at the University of Liverpool and am
conducting a study into the benefits that software organizations gain
by actively practicing unit testing.

What I found in the past years is that so many people do claim a lot
of benefits around unit testing, but as soon as you ask for "hard
facts" they have no answer.

My study wants to bring more light into this area and therefore I need
feedback and data to get to a descriptive overview on how the benefits
are perceived in the "real world" and not only in books and articles.

Please help me in that. I will be happy to post and share the results
with anyone and if it is okay I will also post it on this forum.

Here is the link to the survey. It should only take you 5 minutes.

https://www.surveymonkey.com/s.aspx?sm=zfbx0YhilnOVMwXpSjTWYw_3d_3d

Thanks in advance for any participation!
